6-K 1 nu20250416_6k1.htm 6-K SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION Washington, D.C. 20549 &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; FORM 6-K Report of Foreign Private Issuer Pursuant to Rule 13a-16 or 15d-16 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 &nbsp; For the month of April, 2025 Commission File Number 001-41129 &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Nu Holdings Ltd. (Exact name of registrant as specified in its charter) &nbsp; Nu Holdings Ltd. (Translation of Registrant's name into English) &nbsp; Campbells Corporate Services Limited, Floor 4, Willow House, Cricket Square, KY1-9010 Grand Cayman, Cayman Islands +1 345 949 2648 (Address of principal executive office) &nbsp; Indicate by check mark whether the registrant files or will file annual reports under cover Form 20-F or Form 40-F. &nbsp; Form 20-F ( X ) Form 40-F &#9; &nbsp; Indicate by check mark whether the registrant by furnishing the information contained in this Form is also thereby furnishing the information to the Commission pursuant to Rule 12g3-2(b) under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934. Yes &#9; No ( X ) &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; NOTICE TO THE MARKET &nbsp; &nbsp; Grand Cayman, Cayman Islands, April 24, 2025 &ndash; Nu Holdings Ltd. (&ldquo;Nu Holdings&rdquo;, &quot;Nu&quot; or &ldquo;Company&rdquo;), hereby informs its shareholders and the market that Nu M&eacute;xico Financiera, S.A. de C.V., S.F.P (&quot;Nu M&eacute;xico&quot;) was notified today that it has received regulatory approval from the Comisi&oacute;n Nacional Bancaria y de Valore s (&quot;CNBV&quot;), in coordination with Banco de M&eacute;xico (&quot;Banxico&quot;) and the Mexican Ministry of Finance (&ldquo;SHCP&rdquo;), to begin the conversion process into a multiple bank, under the corporate name Nubank, S.A., Instituci&oacute;n de Banca M&uacute;ltiple. &nbsp; The next step of the process is the testing of Nu Mexico&rsquo;s systems and processes, which is expected to begin shortly. The final step of the conversion process is the issuance of the Operation Authorization by the abovementioned Mexican regulators, in accordance with their processing timeline. This milestone reinforces the long term vision and commitment of the Company to Mexico and will allow the expansion of its portfolio of credit, payments and savings products in the country. &nbsp; Nu Holdings will keep the market informed of any new relevant developments on the topic. &nbsp; &nbsp; Investor Relations Guilherme Souto investors@nubank.com.br Media Relations Leila Suwwan press@nubank.com.br &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; SIGNATURES Pursuant to the requirements of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, the registrant has duly caused this report to be signed on its behalf by the undersigned, thereunto duly authorized. &nbsp; &nbsp; Nu Holdings Ltd. &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; By:&nbsp; /s/ Jorg Friedemann &nbsp; &nbsp; Jorg Friedemann Investor Relations Officer &nbsp; Date:&nbsp;&nbsp;April 24, 2025 &nbsp;
